data.prayer: Please, teach the 295,646 believers in Ningbo, Zhejiang, China how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ningbo, Zhejiang, China

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Ningbo, Zhejiang, China.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the county of Ningbo, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 3,538,595 lost people in  Ningbo, Zhejiang, China have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the She people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the She people know you.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Ningbo, Zhejiang, China.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Ningbo
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.section_summary:
the county of Ningbo, Zhejiang, China has a population of 3,897,200.

We estimate Ningbo has 295,646 people who might know Jesus, 62,959 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,538,595 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Ningbo.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.
